title: 68: What Happened The Night of The Murders
description:
We discuss the latest leaks on what happened the night Maggie and Paul Murdaugh were murdered. People Magazine and the Wall Street Journal wrote about things they have uncovered about that fateful night. We see contradictions in information that was released earlier and what came out recently. A lot of things don't line up for us.
Plus, we talk with former FBI Special Agent, Bobby Chacon on his theories, and his experience with guns and media leaks. www.bobbychacon.com
